surfboards.name: Zeus Board
surfboards.description: The CI team calls the Zeus “A quick and loose all-around performance shortboard. It is a great board at its current price point.

surfboards.name: Taco Grinder
surfboards.description: Originating as a board for navigating long barrels in Mexico, the Taco Grinder is a direct result of CI team needs and experiments.

surfboards.name: Black and White
surfboards.description: A high performance shortboard designed for down the line speed and easy rail-to-rail transitions. Performance is key with this board

surfboards.name: Twin Fin
surfboards.description: The Twin Fin has a retro 70’s feel, with updated performance qualities. It was originally designed and hand shaped by Britt Merrick.

surfboards.name: High Five
surfboards.description: The High 5 was cooked up by CI staff to be fun and forgiving but with performance sprinkled in. Designed to be a quicker and nimbler.

surfboards.name: Bonzer shelter
surfboards.description: Since 1969 only a few miles and some of California’s best point breaks separated Al Merrick and The Campbell Brothers a design offering.

shirts.name: RAIL SLEEVE LS TEE
shirts.description: Long sleeves for long arms. Keep it comfy and keeping it cool. 100% Premium Ultra Soft Cotton, 100% organic farbic fibers. Top notch.

shirts.name: STAMPED FLAG PREMIUM TEE
shirts.description: Clean, classic, comfortable, cool. 100% Premium Ultra Soft Cotton. Support the brand that has brought you so many of your favorite boards.

shirts.name: CLEAR HEX TANK
shirts.description: 100% cotton premium slim fit tee that allows you to shred the waves like nothing before. Great for protection from big or small scratches.

shoes.name: OLD SKOOL PRO
shoes.description: The Old Skool Pro, a Vans classic upgraded for enhanced performance, features suede, canvas, and leather uppers, single-wrap foxing tape.

shoes.name: SLIP-ON
shoes.description: The Classic Slip-On has a low profile, slip-on canvas upper with all-over checker print, elastic side accents,

shoes.name: OT AUTHENTIC
shoes.description: The Outdoors Authentic combines the original and now iconic Vans low top style with sturdy canvas uppers, an allover print, and metal eyelets.
